projects.name: Automated Metadata Extraction and Reporting Tool (AMERT)
projects.description: A Python-powered tool designed to extract metadata from PDF and DOCX files within nested folder structures, generating organized Excel reports. Ideal for managing coursework submissions or research documents.
features: Metadata extraction from PDF/DOCX files (author, title, creation date, etc.)
Recursive folder scanning for deep directory structures
Excel report generation with organized metadata
Error logging for robust issue tracking
Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, macOS, Linux)

projects.name: SkillForge E-Learning Platform
projects.description: A modern e-learning platform offering high-quality educational content from industry experts, featuring an intuitive interface for learners and instructors. Built with Java EE, Bootstrap, and MySQL for robust course management and user engagement.
features: User authentication with role-based access control (Admin, Instructor, Student)
Course creation, editing, and management with media support
Responsive design with modern dashboards for all user roles
Admin tools for user management and platform analytics
Planned features: interactive quizzes, payment system, and social features

projects.name: Java Servlet REST API
projects.description: An experimental Java-based RESTful API for a Todo application, utilizing Jakarta Servlet API and Gson for JSON processing. This project explores CRUD operations on Todo items, despite Servlets not being naturally suited for API development.
features: CRUD operations for Todo items (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
JSON processing with Gson
MySQL database integration for persistent storage
RESTful endpoints for managing Todo items
Toggle status functionality via PATCH requests

projects.name: Student Folder Management System
projects.description: A Python-based automation tool that organizes student data from Excel sheets into a hierarchical folder structure, creating personalized Excel files for each student based on sections and group assignments.
features: Automated creation of section and group folders
Generation of individual student Excel files with pre-filled information
Case-insensitive name matching for accurate student grouping
Comprehensive logging for process tracking and troubleshooting
Support for Excel file handling with openpyxl

projects.name: Online Digital Library
projects.description: A digital library system developed in 2018 for B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, utilizing Java, Spring Framework, and Hibernate for back-end development, MySQL for database management, and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for an accessible user interface.
features: Back-end development with Java, Spring Framework, and Hibernate
MySQL database for efficient resource management
User-friendly interface built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Enhanced accessibility for educational resources

projects.name: The Impact of Personalized Marketing on Growing Advertising Reach of Local Business
projects.description: A 2022 MBA research project analyzing the effectiveness of personalized marketing strategies on enhancing the advertising reach of local businesses, offering insights for optimizing marketing approaches based on customer engagement data.
features: Analysis of personalized marketing effectiveness
Insights derived from customer engagement data
Recommendations for optimizing local business marketing strategies
